item.title: Monteverde
item.description: Introduction IP: 10.10.10.172 This is my write-up for the Hack the Box machine Monteverde Initial nmap scan Running the inital nmap scan nmap -sV -sC -p- -oN nmap 10.10.10.172 Yielded the following results
item.content:
Introduction

IP: 10.10.10.172

This is my write-up for the Hack the Box machine Monteverde

Initial nmap scan

Running the inital nmap scan

nmap -sV -sC -p- -oN nmap 10.10.10.172

Yielded the following results

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my blog! This is where I'll be posting my CTF write-ups, hobby material & other things. Feel free to contact me on twitter @xyniath
item.content:
Welcome to my blog!

This is where I'll be posting my CTF write-ups, hobby material & other things.

Feel free to contact me on twitter @xyniath
